original_title: セレブ妻 監禁拘束調教の果てに
overview: Michiru, the wife of the president of an investment company, Mamoru Tasaki, was living a splendid life without any inconvenience. Her husband's misdeeds, which her wife doesn't know about... Mamoru was a fraudster, so to speak, who extended his achievements with an investment story of sharing sales profits. Mamoru is accused at last and the victims start to move. And Michiru...
title: Celebrity Wife Restrained And Trained Michiru Kujo
